00009 MonitoredQuantity::MonitoredQuantity(double timeWindowForRecentResults):
00010   enabled_(true)
00011 {
00012   setNewTimeWindowForRecentResults(timeWindowForRecentResults);
00013 }
00014 
00015 void MonitoredQuantity::addSample(double value)
00016 {
00017   if (! enabled_) {return;}
00018 
00019   boost::mutex::scoped_lock sl(accumulationMutex_);
00020 
00021   if (lastCalculationTime_ <= 0.0) {
00022     lastCalculationTime_ = getCurrentTime();
00023   }
00024 
00025   ++workingSampleCount_;
00026   workingValueSum_ += value;
00027   workingValueSumOfSquares_ += (value * value);
00028 
00029   if (value < workingValueMin_) workingValueMin_ = value;
00030   if (value > workingValueMax_) workingValueMax_ = value;
00031 }
00032 
00033 long long MonitoredQuantity::getSampleCount(DataSetType dataSet)
00034 {
00035   boost::mutex::scoped_lock sl(resultsMutex_);
00036 
00037   if (dataSet == RECENT) {
00038     return recentSampleCount_;
00039   }
00040   else {
00041     return fullSampleCount_;
00042   }
00043 }

00140 
00141 void MonitoredQuantity::calculateStatistics(double currentTime)
00142 {
00143   if (! enabled_) {return;}
00144   if (lastCalculationTime_ <= 0.0) {return;}
00145 
00146   // create local copies of the working values to minimize the
00147   // time that we could block a thread trying to add a sample.
00148   // Also, reset the working values.
00149   long long latestSampleCount;
00150   double latestValueSum;
00151   double latestValueSumOfSquares;
00152   double latestValueMin;
00153   double latestValueMax;
00154   double latestDuration;
00155   {
00156     boost::mutex::scoped_lock sl(accumulationMutex_);
00157 
00158     latestSampleCount = workingSampleCount_;
00159     latestValueSum = workingValueSum_;
00160     latestValueSumOfSquares = workingValueSumOfSquares_;
00161     latestValueMin = workingValueMin_;
00162     latestValueMax = workingValueMax_;
00163     latestDuration = currentTime - lastCalculationTime_;
00164 
00165     lastCalculationTime_ = currentTime;
00166     workingSampleCount_ = 0;
00167     workingValueSum_ = 0.0;
00168     workingValueSumOfSquares_ = 0.0;
00169     workingValueMin_ =  999999999.0;
00170     workingValueMax_ = -999999999.0;
00171   }
00172 
00173   // lock out any interaction with the results while we update them
00174   {
00175     boost::mutex::scoped_lock sl(resultsMutex_);
00176 
00177     // we simply add the latest results to the full set
00178     fullSampleCount_ += latestSampleCount;
00179     fullValueSum_ += latestValueSum;
00180     fullValueSumOfSquares_ += latestValueSumOfSquares;
00181     if (latestValueMin < fullValueMin_) {fullValueMin_ = latestValueMin;}
00182     if (latestValueMax < fullValueMax_) {fullValueMax_ = latestValueMax;}
00183     fullDuration_ += latestDuration;
00184 
00185     // for the recent results, we need to replace the contents of
00186     // the working bin and re-calculate the recent values
00187     (*binSampleCount_)[workingBinId_] = latestSampleCount;
00188     (*binValueSum_)[workingBinId_] = latestValueSum;
00189     (*binValueSumOfSquares_)[workingBinId_] = latestValueSumOfSquares;
00190     (*binValueMin_)[workingBinId_] = latestValueMin;
00191     (*binValueMax_)[workingBinId_] = latestValueMax;
00192     (*binDuration_)[workingBinId_] = latestDuration;
00193 
00194     recentSampleCount_ = 0;
00195     recentValueSum_ = 0.0;
00196     recentValueSumOfSquares_ = 0.0;
00197     recentValueMin_ =  999999999.0;
00198     recentValueMax_ = -999999999.0;
00199     recentDuration_ = 0.0;
00200 
00201     for (int idx = 0; idx < binCount_; ++idx) {
00202       recentSampleCount_ += (*binSampleCount_)[idx];
00203       recentValueSum_ += (*binValueSum_)[idx];
00204       recentValueSumOfSquares_ += (*binValueSumOfSquares_)[idx];
00205       if ((*binValueMin_)[idx] < recentValueMin_) {
00206         recentValueMin_ = (*binValueMin_)[idx];
00207       }
00208       if ((*binValueMax_)[idx] < recentValueMax_) {
00209         recentValueMax_ = (*binValueMax_)[idx];
00210       }
00211       recentDuration_ = (*binDuration_)[idx];
00212     }
00213 
00214     // update the working bin ID here so that we are ready for
00215     // the next calculation request
00216     ++workingBinId_;
00217     if (workingBinId_ >= binCount_) {workingBinId_ = 0;}
00218 
00219     // calculate the derived full values
00220     if (fullDuration_ > 0.0) {
00221       fullSampleRate_ = ((double) fullSampleCount_) / fullDuration_;
00222       fullValueRate_ = ((double) fullValueSum_) / fullDuration_;
00223     }
00224     else {
00225       fullSampleRate_ = 0.0;
00226       fullValueRate_ = 0.0;
00227     }
00228 
00229     if (fullSampleCount_ > 0) {
00230       fullValueAverage_ = fullValueSum_ / ((double) fullSampleCount_);
00231 
00232       double squareAvg = (fullValueSumOfSquares_ / (double) fullSampleCount_);
00233       double avg = (fullValueSum_ / (double) fullSampleCount_);
00234       double sigSquared = squareAvg - avg*avg;
00235       if(sigSquared > 0.0) {
00236         fullValueRMS_ = sqrt(sigSquared);
00237       }
00238       else {
00239         fullValueRMS_ = 0.0;
00240       }
00241     }
00242     else {
00243       fullValueAverage_ = 0.0;
00244       fullValueRMS_ = 0.0;
00245     }
00246 
00247     // calculate the derived recent values
00248     if (recentDuration_ > 0.0) {
00249       recentSampleRate_ = ((double) recentSampleCount_) / recentDuration_;
00250       recentValueRate_ = ((double) recentValueSum_) / recentDuration_;
00251     }
00252     else {
00253       recentSampleRate_ = 0.0;
00254       recentValueRate_ = 0.0;
00255     }
00256 
00257     if (recentSampleCount_ > 0) {
00258       recentValueAverage_ = recentValueSum_ / ((double) recentSampleCount_);
00259 
00260       double squareAvg = (recentValueSumOfSquares_ /
00261                           (double) recentSampleCount_);
00262       double avg = (recentValueSum_ / (double) recentSampleCount_);
00263       double sigSquared = squareAvg - avg*avg;
00264       if(sigSquared > 0.0) {
00265         recentValueRMS_ = sqrt(sigSquared);
00266       }
00267       else {
00268         recentValueRMS_ = 0.0;
00269       }
00270     }
00271     else {
00272       recentValueAverage_ = 0.0;
00273       recentValueRMS_ = 0.0;
00274     }
00275   }
00276 }
00277 
00278 void MonitoredQuantity::reset()
00279 {
00280   {
00281     boost::mutex::scoped_lock sl(accumulationMutex_);
00282 
00283     lastCalculationTime_ = -1.0;
00284     workingSampleCount_ = 0;
00285     workingValueSum_ = 0.0;
00286     workingValueSumOfSquares_ = 0.0;
00287     workingValueMin_ =  999999999.0;
00288     workingValueMax_ = -999999999.0;
00289   }
00290 
00291   {
00292     boost::mutex::scoped_lock sl(resultsMutex_);
00293 
00294     workingBinId_ = 0;
00295     for (int idx = 0; idx < binCount_; ++idx) {
00296       (*binSampleCount_)[idx] = 0;
00297       (*binValueSum_)[idx] = 0.0;
00298       (*binValueSumOfSquares_)[idx] = 0.0;
00299       (*binValueMin_)[idx] =  999999999.0;
00300       (*binValueMax_)[idx] = -999999999.0;
00301       (*binDuration_)[idx] = 0.0;
00302     }
00303 
00304     fullSampleCount_ = 0;
00305     fullSampleRate_ = 0.0;
00306     fullValueSum_ = 0.0;
00307     fullValueSumOfSquares_ = 0.0;
00308     fullValueAverage_ = 0.0;
00309     fullValueRMS_ = 0.0;
00310     fullValueMin_ =  999999999.0;
00311     fullValueMax_ = -999999999.0;
00312     fullValueRate_ = 0.0;
00313     fullDuration_ = 0.0;
00314 
00315     recentSampleCount_ = 0;
00316     recentSampleRate_ = 0.0;
00317     recentValueSum_ = 0.0;
00318     recentValueSumOfSquares_ = 0.0;
00319     recentValueAverage_ = 0.0;
00320     recentValueRMS_ = 0.0;
00321     recentValueMin_ =  999999999.0;
00322     recentValueMax_ = -999999999.0;
00323     recentValueRate_ = 0.0;
00324     recentDuration_ = 0.0;
00325   }
00326 }
00327 
00328 void MonitoredQuantity::enable()
00329 {
00330   if (! enabled_) {
00331     reset();
00332     enabled_ = true;
00333   }
00334 }
00335 
00336 void MonitoredQuantity::disable()
00337 {
00338   if (enabled_) {
00339     enabled_ = false;
00340   }
00341 }
00342 
00343 void MonitoredQuantity::setNewTimeWindowForRecentResults(double interval)
00344 {
00345   // lock the results objects since we're dramatically changing the
00346   // bins used for the recent results
00347   {
00348     boost::mutex::scoped_lock sl(resultsMutex_);
00349 
00350     intervalForRecentStats_ = interval;
00351 
00352     // determine how many bins we should use in our sliding window
00353     // by dividing the input time window by the expected calculation
00354     // interval and rounding to the nearest integer.
00355     binCount_ =
00356       static_cast<int>((intervalForRecentStats_ / 
00357                         static_cast<double>(EXPECTED_CALCULATION_INTERVAL)) +
00358                        0.5);
00359 
00360     // create the vectors for the binned quantities
00361     binSampleCount_.reset(new std::vector<long long>());
00362     binValueSum_.reset(new std::vector<double>());
00363     binValueSumOfSquares_.reset(new std::vector<double>());
00364     binValueMin_.reset(new std::vector<double>());
00365     binValueMax_.reset(new std::vector<double>());
00366     binDuration_.reset(new std::vector<double>());
00367 
00368     // populate the vectors with initial values (since everything
00369     // after this point assumes that the vectors have the correct
00370     // number of entries)
00371     for (int idx = 0; idx < binCount_; ++idx) {
00372       this->binSampleCount_->push_back(0);
00373       this->binValueSum_->push_back(0.0);
00374       this->binValueSumOfSquares_->push_back(0.0);
00375       this->binValueMin_->push_back(0.0);
00376       this->binValueMax_->push_back(0.0);
00377       this->binDuration_->push_back(0.0);
00378     }
00379   }
00380 
00381   // call the reset method to populate the correct initial values
00382   // for the internal sample data
00383   reset();
00384 }
00385 
00386 double MonitoredQuantity::getCurrentTime()
00387 {
00388   double now = -1.0;
00389   struct timeval timeStruct;
00390   int status = gettimeofday(&timeStruct, 0);
00391   if (status == 0) {
00392     now = ((double) timeStruct.tv_sec) +
00393       (((double) timeStruct.tv_usec) / 1000000.0);
00394   }
00395   return now;
00396 }
